amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress that the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 should be amended to extend the credit with respect to facilities producing energy from certain renewable resources.

vote.text: Amendment SA 133, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 40.

action.text: Amendment SA 133 proposed by Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S528-529; text: CR S528) To express the sense of Congress that the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 should be amended to extend the credit with respect to facilities producing energy from certain renewable resources.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 133, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 40.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 133, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 40.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 133 proposed by Senator Heitkamp to Amendment SA 2.
